casebody.data:
IN RE: J.H, Z.R., A.R., and D.R. 172A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 16, 2019 Sydney J. Batch, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Hatton, Meredith. Theresa Boucher, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, for Forsyth County DSS. Brandon Duckworth, Attorney Advocate /GAL, for J.H., et al.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 17th of May 2019 by Respondent-Mother:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of May 2019."

Respondent-Mother shall have up to and including the 3rd day of July 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
